name: What Lies Below (JaGTeK Games)
description:
Landing on an alien planet in a submarine, it is your task to explore the deep ocean trenches, scanning ruins and artefacts to gain research points. These points can be used to upgrade your submarine at the base allowing you to utilise mining drills, torpedoes and more. With all the tools at your disposal, can you reach the bottom of the ocean and discovered the secrets of the planet?

An adventure game focussed on researching and upgrading your submarine. You start with only the scanner tool allowing you to scan artefacts and ruins in order to gain research points. Use these research points to upgrade your submarine with useful tech. To get to the deepest part of the ocean you will need all the tech to stand a chance!
